Background

I'm currently a Systems Administrator at University of Texas - Arlington where I manage CI/CD workflows, optimize deployment pipelines, and support academic and research environments. I'm also pursuing my Master's in Computer Science at UTA, focusing on Machine Learning research at the Cyberphysical Systems Security Lab.

As a software engineer, I'm passionate about building scalable, high-quality software solutions. I have experience in full-stack development, CI/CD pipelines, secure authentication systems, and machine learning. My goal is to always build applications that are efficient, secure, and maintainable while delivering exceptional user experiences.

Previously, I've worked as a Full Stack Developer at Fasi Health, a Front End Web Developer at Fameve, and a Software Development Intern at jambopay, where I've contributed to B2B SaaS platforms, implemented secure authentication systems, and optimized deployment processes.
